tabs.ariaLabel: Two separate tabs: one for the template e-service details and another for using parties.

bottomActions.navigateTemplateVersions: Navigate to another e-service template version

alert.label: Specify whether this template e-service handles personal data.

technicalInformations.title: E-service technical specifications
technicalInformations.description: In this section you can check the specifications of the e-service and make changes.

usefulLinks.title: Useful links
usefulLinks.implementAndManageEServiceTemplate: How do I implement and manage an e-service template?
usefulLinks.updateEserviceInstance: How can I update an e-service instance?

updateEServiceTemplateNameDrawer.title: Edit template e-service name
updateEServiceTemplateNameDrawer.subtitle: From this panel you can update the name of the template e-service. The changes made will take effect immediately

validation.sameValue: The template e-service name must be different from the current one

updateEServiceTemplateAudienceDrawer.title: Edit the target audience
updateEServiceTemplateAudienceDrawer.subtitle: From this panel, you can update the target audience of the template. The changes made will take effect immediately

validation.sameValue: The template target audience must be different from the current one

updateEServiceTemplateDescriptionDrawer.title: Edit the template e-service description
updateEServiceTemplateDescriptionDrawer.subtitle: From this panel, you can update the description of the template. The changes made will take effect immediately.

validation.sameValue: The template e-service description must be different from the current one

updateEServiceTemplateThresholdsDrawer.subtitle: From this panel, you can update the quotas of the template e-service. The changes made will take effect immediately

updateDocumentationDrawer.title: Edit documentation
updateDocumentationDrawer.subtitle: Now you can edit, download and delete documents attached to the e-service template.
updateDocumentationDrawer.interfaceInfoTooltip: The “API Specification” file is not editable. To update it, create a new version.

versionSelectorDrawer.title: Navigate to another e-service template version
versionSelectorDrawer.label: Select version

usingTenantTable.noDataLabel: This template has not yet been used by any party.
usingTenantTable.noResultsLabel: Your current search returned no results

actions.createNewEServiceInstanceDisabled: You have already created an instance from this template.
actions.createInstanceDisabledTenantKind: It is not possible to use the template because the producer has not created a purpose for your type of entity.
actions.createInstanceDisabledPersonalData: It is not possible to use the template because the producer has not indicated whether personal data is processed.

noMultiDataLabel: You have not yet created e-service templates.

step1.readOnlyIntendedTargetLabel: Who is this template intended for?
step1.readOnlyDescriptionLabel: What does this template allow you to do?
step1.readOnlyModeLabel: Does the e-service deliver or receive data?

eserviceTemplateNameField.label: Template name
eserviceTemplateNameField.infoLabel: This is the name that will appear in the e-service template catalog and will become the base name of all e-services created from this template.

intendedTargetField.label: Who is the template intended for?

eserviceDescriptionField.label: What does this e-service allow you to do?

eserviceTemplateTechnologyField.label: What technology is your API built with?

eserviceTemplateModeField.label: Does the e-service deliver or receive data?
eserviceTemplateModeField.tooltipReceiveMode: Currently, the use of templates is limited to the delivery of data.

isSignalHubEnabled.label: Suggest to those who will use this template to report data changes with Signal Hub

infoLabel.after: when there are changes to the e-service data.

DELIVER.label: Does the e-service deliver personal data?

RECEIVE.label: Does the e-service receive personal data?

versionDescriptionField.label: Describe this e-service version*
versionDescriptionField.infoLabel: If it is a new version, indicate what has changed from the previous one

documentationSection.title: Documentation
documentationSection.description: Attach the technical documentation useful to consumers of e-services created from this template.

agreementApprovalPolicySection.label: Suggest to those who will use this template the manual approval of received usage requests

thresholdsSwitch.label: Suggest custom API threshold values to the implementer

purpose.firstVersionOnlyEditableInfoAlert: The contents of this step will no longer be editable after the publication of the first version of the e-service

purposeTableSection.title: Purpose
purposeTableSection.description: Indicate the use cases for which you intend to collect data. For each purpose you will need to complete a risk analysis.
purposeTableSection.noSelectedPurposesTooltip: You must indicate at least one purpose to continue

tenantKindDialog.title: Indicate who will be able to use the following risk analysis.
tenantKindDialog.description: Indicate for whom the following risk analysis is filled.

tenantKind.labelPA: Public administration (Art. 2, comma 2, letter “a” of Codice dell'Amministrazione Digitale)
tenantKind.labelNotPA: Operators of public services, publicly controlled companies (Art. 2, comma 2, letters “b” e “c”) or Private

thresholdsSwitch.label: Suggest API calls/day thresholds to those who will use this template

dailyCallsPerConsumerField.label: API calls/day per consumer
dailyCallsPerConsumerField.infoLabel: Enter a number greater than or equal to 1

dailyCallsTotalField.label: Total API calls/day
dailyCallsTotalField.infoLabel: Enter a number greater than the previous one

validation.min: This value cannot be below the threshold set for the API calls/day for each consumer

thresholdsAndAttributes.thresholdsInfoAlert: Those who use this template will be able to modify the suggested thresholds and customize them for certified attributes.

accessRequirements.title: Access requirements
accessRequirements.description: Define who can access this e-service. Create one or more requirements and associate the required attributes to each. The consumer must meet all the indicated requirements and possess at least one of the attributes in each requirement. <1>Learn more about attributes</1>
accessRequirements.placeholder: This section will be available soon.

tabs.certifiedDescription: These are attributes certified by a <1>recognized authoritative source.</1>
tabs.verifiedDescription: These are attributes verified <1>by other organizations</1>, with the possibility of requesting a verification from the provider.
tabs.declaredDescription: These are attributes declared by the consumer during the service request. No verification from the provider is required.

interface.title: Interface*
interface.alert: You can upload a file without contact data, terms and conditions, and server URLs, as these will be filled in by the implementer in the next phase.

description.rest: Upload a draft of the OpenAPI specification that describes the API.
description.soap: Upload a draft of the WSDL specification that describes the API

attributes.attributesDescription: Please indicate all the certified, verified, and declared attributes that the consumer must have in order to create an agreement for the e-service

createAttributeDrawer.subtitle: Once created, the attribute will be available in the list to be added to an e-service

summary.title: {{eserviceTemplateName}}, version {{versionEserviceTemplateNumber}}

intendedTarget.label: Who is this template intended for?

templateDescription.label: What does this template allow you to do?

isSignalHubEnabled.label: Did you suggest using Signal Hub?

certified.label: Certified Attributes
certified.description: These are attributes certified by a <1>recognized authoritative source.</1>
certified.noAttributesAlert: This e-service does not require certified attributes

verified.label: Verified Attributes
verified.description: These are attributes verified <1>by other organizations</1>, with the possibility of requesting a verification from the producer.
verified.noAttributesAlert: This e-service does not require verified attributes

declared.label: Declared Attributes
declared.description: These are attributes declared by the consumer during the usage request. No verification from the producer is required.
declared.noAttributesAlert: This e-service does not require declared attributes

attributes.requirementDescription: The consumer must possess at least one of the attributes in this requirement.

manualApproval.label: Did you suggest manually approving usage requests?

summary.missingFieldsBanner: To publish, please fill in the missing information.
summary.missingFieldsTooltip: Some information is still missing. Complete the draft to publish.

notPublishableTooltip.label: One or more required fields have not been filled out. Please complete the draft.

summary.missingPersonalDataField: You have not indicated whether the e-service delivers or receives personal data. You can go back to the first step to specify it, or you can proceed and add this information later.

alertUpdatePersonalData.label: Specify whether this e-service template handles personal data.
